oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Similarities Among FARA-Led IAR4D Innovation Platforms
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: S. Nokoe
A.A. Adekunle
A.B. Ayanwale
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Comparison of the performance of a number of innovation platforms on which FARA is involved, highlighting key factors which may influence differences in innovation performance results.
